'''v0.16.0 alpha build 3'''<ref>{{citation|url=http://pocketbeta.minecraft.net/2016/08/notes-for-revised-revised-0.html|title=Notes for revised revised 0.16 Beta build 1, aka 0.15.90.2|website=pocketbeta.minecraft.net}}</ref><ref>https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MCPE/fixforversion/15668</ref> (labelled '''v0.15.90 alpha build 1''' in-game and '''0.15.90.2'''<ref>{{citation|url=http://pocketbeta.minecraft.net/2016/09/0160-beta-build-numbers.html|title=Minecraft: Beta Changelogs: 0.16.0 beta build numbers|website=pocketbeta.minecraft.net}}</ref> internally) is the third build version released for [[Pocket Edition v0.16.0 alpha|v0.16.0]], also known as the [[Boss Update]].

VR bug fixes in this update were later added to [[Pocket Edition v0.15.10 alpha|v0.15.10]].<ref>{{citation|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20161008044517/http://www.mojang.com/2016/10/fearsome-fixes-the-spooky-01510-changelog-for-pocket-win-10|title=Fearsome fixes! Changelog 0.15.10 for Pocket / Win 10|website=[[mojang.com]]}}</ref>
